properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 9:29AM MST until February 9 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
...SNOW LATE SATURDAY INTO EARLY SUNDAY...

.The next system will move into the area this afternoon, bringing
snowfall later today and tonight. Snow will taper off Sunday
morning.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches.

* WHERE...Northern Campbell County.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds this evening through tomorrow
morning are expected to worsen travel conditions by lowering
visibilities.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the
5 1 1 app for your state.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY
